task_description: 将灌汤包海报（黄色背景）中的包子元素转换为Pixar 3D ICON风格

operation_params.style_reference: Pixar 3D cartoon style for food elements, Q-version cute design, high-gloss texture, professional lighting
operation_params.additional_prompt: Transform ONLY the steamed buns (baozi) in this poster into Pixar 3D ICON style while preserving all text elements ("灌汤包", "专统手工包点", etc.) and poster layout. Convert the white baozi (top row) and black/dark baozi (bottom rows) into 3D with glossy soft texture, clear spiral pleats, soft shadows, and steam effects. Keep the bright yellow background. Maintain text clarity and poster composition. The contrast between white and dark baozi should be enhanced in 3D. 1024x1024px, commercial quality.

metadata.notes: HOO XIANG品牌灌汤包海报3D转换（黄色背景版）
